name: Crime Police Chase Pursuit
description:
Crime Police Chase Pursuit game has world-class bulletproof cars to drive and modern guns to shoot and it will sure to give you a major adrenaline rush. drive the monster cars on extreme km/h with much detailed control to crash and burn your way and enjoy the adventure of police chase thief in a new way. It is an all-out war between you and your rivals.
Features:

Powerful police cars
Huge open world with wide open roads
Challenge mode - police car chasing
Endless Patrolling game mode
Emergency levels
Dynamic camera angles
Stunning 3D graphics
